extendedInfo.description: This app can be used to train the dynamic vision and visual recovery!Dynamic visionãis ability to quickly and accurately determine what is moving.By training in dynamic vision, you can expect to effect recovery of vision.Since this game requires concentration and a wider field of view also be expected brain activation.You can train the ability of such a momentary inspiration, judgment, comprehension, concentration and memory power by activating the brain!It is also recommended for improvement and prevention of dementia!ãThis game recommended pointãã»Improvement of dynamic visionã»Visual recoveryã»Sports such as baseball, soccer progressã»Improvement in memory and concentrationã»Improvement of judgmentã»Prevention of dementia, improvementã»Killing timeI recommend to those who want to train the brain and visual recoveryãHow to useãDiagnostic game start by clicking on the "è¨ºæ­éå§" of the title screen.Image pops out from the right by pressing the "1/5åç®" button.Please select your answer from among the four cards!"æ­£è§£" for correct"æ®å¿µ" for shameResult comes out the last of stage 5 in game.
